Brief

Make the most of your London Marathon experience with the official 2021 London Marathon app! Whether you're a runner, a spectator, or a fan from afar, this app is your digital companion for one of the most iconic marathon events in the world.

The 2021 London Marathon app is the ultimate toolkit for participants and observers alike, delivering live updates, valuable insights, and enhancing the overall experience of the marathon. With no pricing barrier, it beckons everyone to partake in the excitement and camaraderie of this celebrated event.
